# The Best Bluetooth Headsets (Review & Buying Guide) in 2020

![best earbud](https://www.carbibles.com/wp-content/uploads/bfi_thumb/best-
earbud-6s57hprejs96zr8wee36m0tfalirelr2cp6goimpnc6.jpg)

Contents

  * The Best Bluetooth Headset
  * 1 FOCUSPOWER F10 Mini Bluetooth Earbud 
  * 2 Plantronics Explorer 50 Bluetooth Headset 
  * 3 TOORUN Bluetooth Headset M26 
  * 4 Kissral Bluetooth Headphone 
  * 5 Motorola H720 Bluetooth Headset 
  * 6 Plantronics Voyager Legend Mobile Bluetooth Headset 
  * 7 Mpow Pro Wireless Bluetooth Headset with Microphone 
  * 8 Aminy Bluetooth Headset 
  * 9 HonShoop Spoon B1 Bluetooth Headset 
  * 10 HIFEER IPX5 Bluetooth Headset 

By Dan Collins

Published Nov. 8, 2018

Car Bibles is reader-supported. When you buy through links on our site, we may
earn an affiliate commission. [Learn more](https://www.carbibles.com/about)

It’s no secret that driving while looking at your phone is a bad idea.
Distracted driving, whether a [result of
texting](https://www.carbibles.com/dangers-of-texting-and-driving/), talking
on the phone or fiddling with the stereo, is a dangerous practice that
significantly increases your risk of road traffic accidents. The only issue
is, we’re all pretty much depended on (and addicted to!) our technology
nowadays and although it may be safer to demand of people to completely ignore
their gadgets while driving, it’s simply not realistic. So what can you do to
increase your focus while driving without giving up your technology? Switch to
Bluetooth headsets.

With a quality Bluetooth headphone, you can say goodbye to distracted driving
and hello to safer travel, crystal clear phone calls and music. We’ve rounded
up 10 of our favorite, best Bluetooth headsets here, so you can choose the
right fit for yourself or a friend in need. Without further ado, let’s jump
right into exploring some of the best Bluetooth earpieces of 2020.

## **The Best Bluetooth Headset**

###

1

FOCUSPOWER F10 Mini Bluetooth Earbud

See More Reviews

![focus power earbud](//www.carbibles.com/wp-content/plugins/a3-lazy-
load/assets/images/lazy_placeholder.gif)![focus power
earbud](https://www.carbibles.com/wp-content/uploads/bfi_thumb/focus-power-
earbud-6s57hq0v5lhf928gm3zza98kyjggw1r8c7o8bpllaia.jpg)

Check Latest Price

If you don’t like using Bluetooth earbuds for fear of looking like an extra in
a sci-fi movie, a small, practically invisible Bluetooth earbud such as the
FocusPower F10 is the way to go. Tiny but powerful, this Bluetooth earpiece is
ergonomically designed to conform to the shape of your ear, ensuring a
comfortable wear that is so light, you’ll hardly notice it’s there.

The FocusPower F10 uses Bluetooth 4.1 & EDR technology, meaning it’s
compatible with all newr Bluetooth devices and can be instantly connected to a
smartphone, or even two smartphones, a laptop, tablet or any other similar
device from up to 33 feet away. Importantly, it broadcasts super-clear voice
and reproduces good-quality audio. And for such a small device, the battery
life is great – with a 55mAH lithium-ion battery, it delivers around 6-8 hours
of talk time, and around 7 hours of music time, as long as it’s on 30-40%
volume. The earpiece is also water-resistant and as such, ideal for
exercising. It’s of course also wireless and uses magnetic inductive charging,
which is perhaps the most fuss-free charging there is.

Key Features:

Mini wireless Bluetooth earbud

Compatible with most Bluetooth devices + Multiple Pairing

55mAH lithium-ion battery, around 6-8h of talk time

Siri and Google Now compatible

Water-resistant design

Wireless, magnetic inductive charging

Specification:

  * BrandFOCUSPOWER
  * ModelFBA_F10
  * Weight0.16 ounces

Pros

Clear, loud voice and audio

Secure, comfortable fit

Affordable

Cons

None

###

2

Plantronics Explorer 50 Bluetooth Headset

See More Reviews

![plantronics explorer 50 bluetooth headset](//www.carbibles.com/wp-
content/plugins/a3-lazy-load/assets/images/lazy_placeholder.gif)![plantronics
explorer 50 bluetooth headset](https://www.carbibles.com/wp-
content/uploads/bfi_thumb/plantronics-explorer-50-bluetooth-
headset-6s57hqa9jhts4ac2yl41jy67khb6k6q9nkyr6id7cs2.jpg)

See More Reviews

![plantronics explore](//www.carbibles.com/wp-content/plugins/a3-lazy-
load/assets/images/lazy_placeholder.gif)![plantronics
explore](https://www.carbibles.com/wp-content/uploads/bfi_thumb/plantronics-
explore-6s57hqa9jhts4ac2yl41jy67khb6k6q9nkyr6id7cs2.jpg)

![plantronics explorer 50 bluetooth headset](//www.carbibles.com/wp-
content/plugins/a3-lazy-load/assets/images/lazy_placeholder.gif)![plantronics
explorer 50 bluetooth headset](https://www.carbibles.com/wp-
content/uploads/bfi_thumb/plantronics-explorer-50-bluetooth-
headset-6s57hqa6stkn47e9qt3x4wf2sunvaakp4oedjrmdvki.jpg)

![plantronics explore](//www.carbibles.com/wp-content/plugins/a3-lazy-
load/assets/images/lazy_placeholder.gif)![plantronics
explore](https://www.carbibles.com/wp-content/uploads/bfi_thumb/plantronics-
explore-6s57hqa6stkn47e9qt3x4wf2sunvaakp4oedjrmdvki.jpg)

Check Latest Price

If you’re looking for an affordable but powerful and comfortable Bluetooth
headset that produces clear audio, you’ve found it. The Plantronics Explorer
50 is a noise canceling, power-saving headset Bluetooth that can be connected
to two smartphones, either Android or iPhone. This lightweight and comfortable
Bluetooth handsfree piece streams music and GPS directions, making travel more
fun and safe.

The Plantronics Explorer 50 features Bluetooth version 3.0, with Bluetooth
profiles HSP, HFP and A2DP. With noise-reduction technology, it ensures clear
and loud calls even when you’re in a somewhat noisy environment. Importantly,
it also allows you to listen to music or hear GPS directions without fiddling
with your phone or stereo, reducing the risk of road accidents and ensuring a
safer ride. The device uses a DeepSleep mode when appropriate which allows it
to hibernate and conserve power whenever possible, prolonging its battery
life. In fact, this Bluetooth headset delivers up to a whopping 11 hours of
talk time, plus it alerts you when it’s time to recharge the device – and
don’t worry, the alarms are not loud and annoying; rather, they’re whispered
alerts. As for charging, the device comes with a short USB cable, meaning you
can plug it in pretty much anywhere.

Key Features:

Mobile wireless Bluetooth headset

Compatible with Plantronics mobile apps + Multiple Pairing

Noise reduction technology

Delivers up to 11 hours of talk time

Voice alerts for battery and connection status

DeepSleep mode conserves power

USB charging

Specification:

  * BrandPlantronics
  * Model202340-21
  * Weight3.36 ounces

Pros

Clear calls and audio

Great battery life

Comfortable fit

Affordable

Cons

None

###

3

TOORUN Bluetooth Headset M26

See More Reviews

![toorun m26 bluetooth headset](//www.carbibles.com/wp-
content/plugins/a3-lazy-load/assets/images/lazy_placeholder.gif)![toorun m26
bluetooth headset](https://www.carbibles.com/wp-
content/uploads/bfi_thumb/toorun-m26-bluetooth-
headset-6s57hqa9jhts4ac2yl41jy67khb6k6q9nkyr6id7cs2.jpg)

See More Reviews

![TOORUN Bluetooth Headset M26](//www.carbibles.com/wp-
content/plugins/a3-lazy-load/assets/images/lazy_placeholder.gif)![TOORUN
Bluetooth Headset M26](https://www.carbibles.com/wp-
content/uploads/bfi_thumb/TOORUN-Bluetooth-
Headset-M26-6s57hvrnnd1ac0g48khd7hsed885n361ac3r5ah2ohe.jpg)

![toorun m26 bluetooth headset](//www.carbibles.com/wp-
content/plugins/a3-lazy-load/assets/images/lazy_placeholder.gif)![toorun m26
bluetooth headset](https://www.carbibles.com/wp-
content/uploads/bfi_thumb/toorun-m26-bluetooth-
headset-6s57hqa6stkn47e9qt3x4wf2sunvaakp4oedjrmdvki.jpg)

![TOORUN Bluetooth Headset M26](//www.carbibles.com/wp-
content/plugins/a3-lazy-load/assets/images/lazy_placeholder.gif)![TOORUN
Bluetooth Headset M26](https://www.carbibles.com/wp-
content/uploads/bfi_thumb/TOORUN-Bluetooth-
Headset-M26-6s57hvrkwos5bxib0sh8sg19llkud70grfjdijq979u.jpg)

Check Latest Price

If you’re on a really tight budget, but need a quality Bluetooth earpiece that
will produce clear phone calls and stream music for you, check out the TOORUN
Bluetooth Headset M26. This convenient little earbud comes with a noise
canceling microphone and can be paired with two Bluetooth devices at the same
time. It also comes with voice prompt function and battery status reminders –
pretty cool for a device with this low price!

The TOORUN Bluetooth headset features Bluetooth version 4.1 + EDR with
Bluetooth profiles A2DP, AVRCP, HSP, HFP. If you use two smartphones, you can
connect them both to this device and easily stay in touch with your business
contacts and friends and family while driving. The audio quality is really
good, no matter the music you listen to – in fact, it’s almost surprisingly
great for such a low cost unit. As for other options, the Bluetooth headset
can also activate Siri if you wish so and alert you when the battery is
running low, or when you’re connected/disconnected. Speaking of battery, it
delivers a solid 5 hours of music time and 7 hours of talk time, taking around
one hour to fully charge.

Key Features:

Bluetooth headset with noise canceling mic

Compatible with most Bluetooth devices + Multiple Pairing

Delivers up to 7 hours of talk time

Siri compatible, delivers voice alerts for battery and connection status

USB charging cable

Specification:

  * BrandTOORUN
  * Modelncde
  * Weight0.32 ounces

Pros

Clear calls, good sound quality

Affordable

Cons

Doesn’t have a great range (around 10ft)

###

4

Kissral Bluetooth Headphone

See More Reviews

![kissral wireless sport earbud](//www.carbibles.com/wp-
content/plugins/a3-lazy-load/assets/images/lazy_placeholder.gif)![kissral
wireless sport earbud](https://www.carbibles.com/wp-
content/uploads/bfi_thumb/kissral-wireless-sport-
earbud-6s57hq0v5lhf928gm3zza98kyjggw1r8c7o8bpllaia.jpg)

Check Latest Price

Another super-affordable Bluetooth headset, the Kissral earbud is small and
lightweight, comfortable to wear, delivering good quality audio and clear
calls. It’s a perfect piece if you’re looking for small, almost invisible
Bluetooth earbuds that can be worn not only when you drive, but when you train
in a gym or relax at home.

The Kissral is compatible with most kinds of Bluetooth devices, including
tablets, cameras, watches and of course smartphones. It can also be paired
with two devices at ones, meaning two smartphones of your choice. Featuring
Bluetooth 4.1 audio decode technology, it provides clear and good quality
sound for compatible devices. It also helps it’s super-easy to control – with
just one big button, the headset is incredibly easy to operate and adjust. As
for the quality of phone calls, with a built-in HD mic and noise reduction
tech, the earbud produces very clear calls and audio in general. The battery
is a 65mAh lithium, which delivers up to 8 hours of talk time and up to 6
hours of music time, plus 120 hours of standby time.

Key Features:

Mini wireless Bluetooth headset

Compatible with most Bluetooth devices + Multiple Pairing

Noise reduction technology

65mAh lithium battery, up to 8 hours of talk time

Comes with a special charger

Specification:

  * BrandKissral
  * ModelQ13
  * Weight0.64 ounces

Pros

Compact and comfortable

Clear calls

Affordable

Cons

A bit lower volume than usual

###

5

Motorola H720 Bluetooth Headset

See More Reviews

![motorola h720 black bluetooth headset](//www.carbibles.com/wp-
content/plugins/a3-lazy-load/assets/images/lazy_placeholder.gif)![motorola
h720 black bluetooth headset](https://www.carbibles.com/wp-
content/uploads/bfi_thumb/motorola-h720-black-bluetooth-
headset-6s57hq0v5lhf928gm3zza98kyjggw1r8c7o8bpllaia.jpg)

See More Reviews

![motorola](//www.carbibles.com/wp-content/plugins/a3-lazy-
load/assets/images/lazy_placeholder.gif)![motorola](https://www.carbibles.com/wp-
content/uploads/bfi_thumb/motorola-6s57hq0v5lhf928gm3zza98kyjggw1r8c7o8bpllaia.jpg)

![motorola h720 black bluetooth headset](//www.carbibles.com/wp-
content/plugins/a3-lazy-load/assets/images/lazy_placeholder.gif)![motorola
h720 black bluetooth headset](https://www.carbibles.com/wp-
content/uploads/bfi_thumb/motorola-h720-black-bluetooth-
headset-6s57hq0sex8a8zanebzuv7hg6wt5m5lntb3uoyurtaq.jpg)

![motorola](//www.carbibles.com/wp-content/plugins/a3-lazy-
load/assets/images/lazy_placeholder.gif)![motorola](https://www.carbibles.com/wp-
content/uploads/bfi_thumb/motorola-6s57hq0sex8a8zanebzuv7hg6wt5m5lntb3uoyurtaq.jpg)

Check Latest Price

If you’re looking for a great-quality Bluetooth headphone that produces super-
clear and loud phone calls, this is it. The Motorola H720 is one of the best
Bluetooth headsets when it comes to no-nonsense, hands-free phone calls and
sleek, modern design that is also super-comfortable to wear. Of course, its
price is much higher than the other headsets on the list, but there is a very
good reason for that – it broadcasts and produces crystal-clear voice.

The Motorola H720 features RapidConnect which allows you to answer calls with
a simple flip. It also allows you to save power whenever possible – when you
want to talk, you flip open it, once you’re done, you flip it closed, turning
off the device and saving power. Most importantly though, the earpiece has
noise-reduction and echo-cancellation technology, allowing it produce really
clear and loud audio- an especially important feature if you need to take
business calls frequently. As for the headset’s battery life, it’s excellent,
mostly thanks to the RapidConnect feature which helps save the energy. There
is about 8 hours of talk time, which is enough even for the most talkative
users out there.

Key Features:

Sleek wireless Bluetooth headset

Noise reduction and echo-cancellation technology

Delivers up to 8 hours of talk time

RapidConnect feature makes answering calls easy + saves power

A/C charger

Specification:

  * BrandMotorola
  * Model89382N
  * Weight8 ounces

Pros

Modern, comfortable design

Produces crystal-clear phone calls

Great battery life

Cons

Cannot stream music

Pricey

###

6

Plantronics Voyager Legend Mobile Bluetooth Headset

See More Reviews

![plantronics voyager legend wireless bluetooth
headset](//www.carbibles.com/wp-content/plugins/a3-lazy-
load/assets/images/lazy_placeholder.gif)![plantronics voyager legend wireless
bluetooth headset](https://www.carbibles.com/wp-
content/uploads/bfi_thumb/plantronics-voyager-legend-wireless-bluetooth-
headset-6s57hqa9jhts4ac2yl41jy67khb6k6q9nkyr6id7cs2.jpg)

Check Latest Price

A Bluetooth headset that optimizes voice, reduces noise and background sounds,
produces great-quality audio, has voice recognition _and_ is water-resistant?
Yes, such a device actually exists and its name is Plantronics Voyager Legend.
Best of all? This modern-looking, comfortable Bluetooth headset is actually
budget-friendly!

The Voyager Legend is a smart, intuitive device that senses when it’s being
worn to automatically answer calls or redirect audio to your phone – the
action depends on whether you’re placing it on your ear or setting it down. It
features Bluetooth 3.0 with wideband audio support, noise-cancelling
technology and voice recognition. This means it creates an easy hands-free
phone calls experience as you don’t have to press any buttons whatsoever, but
“Answer” or “Ignore” the calls with your voice. As for the clarity of sound,
it’s clear and loud thanks to the noise canceling tech which minimizes noise
and wind and can separate your voice from 80 dBs of background noise. Another
huge plus of this device is its water-resistant design which allows you to use
it even when you jog in the rain or train in the gym. Finally, the lithium ion
polymer battery is more than ok, delivering up to seven hours of talk time.

Key Features:

Mobile Bluetooth headset

Noise canceling technology

Voice recognition + battery and connection status

Siri, Google Now, Cortana compatible

Delivers up to 7 hours of talk time

Water-resistant design

Magnetic based charger

Specification:

  * BrandPlantronics
  * Model10325VRP
  * Weight0.64 ounces

Pros

Clear calls and audio

Smart and intuitive device

Lightweight and comfortable design

Good battery life

Cons

The charger is finicky, can be hard to use

###

7

Mpow Pro Wireless Bluetooth Headset with Microphone

See More Reviews

![mpow pro trucker bluetooth headset](//www.carbibles.com/wp-
content/plugins/a3-lazy-load/assets/images/lazy_placeholder.gif)![mpow pro
trucker bluetooth headset](https://www.carbibles.com/wp-
content/uploads/bfi_thumb/mpow-pro-trucker-bluetooth-
headset-6s57hq0v5lhf928gm3zza98kyjggw1r8c7o8bpllaia.jpg)

Check Latest Price

If small one-piece earbuds are not your thing and you prefer the more classic
over-the-head Bluetooth headset design, check out the Mpow Pro headset. This
wireless device is built specifically for drivers who need to take frequent
phone calls, as it reduces background noises and automatically adjusts voice
to louder and clearer when necessary.

The Mpow Pro features Bluetooth version V2.1, is connectable with any two
Bluetooth devices but supports only calling – ideal for businessmen and
businesswomen who need to stay in regular touch with their colleagues/bosses
even during commuting. The microphone is noise-canceling and omnidirectional,
meaning you can adjust it however is convenient for you. The roam range is
standard – around 30 feet from paired Bluetooth devices. As for the headset’s
battery life, with a whopping 13 hours of talk time, it’s one of the longest
lasting Bluetooth devices out there. Importantly, the entire piece is
lightweight and comfortable to wear as the headband is fully adjustable and
the ear cushions are padded and skin-friendly.

Key Features:

Over-the-head Bluetooth headset

Multiple Pairing

Noise-reduction microphone

Delivers up to 13 hours of talk time

USB charging

Specification:

  * BrandMpow
  * ModelMBH15-PS-2
  * Weight0.8 ounces

Pros

Produces clear phone calls

Good battery life

Affordable

Cons

Cannot stream music

###

8

Aminy Bluetooth Headset

See More Reviews

![aminy bluetooth headset](//www.carbibles.com/wp-content/plugins/a3-lazy-
load/assets/images/lazy_placeholder.gif)![aminy bluetooth
headset](https://www.carbibles.com/wp-content/uploads/bfi_thumb/aminy-
bluetooth-headset-6s57hprgrp52du4u9mvx0kaycllr7ws70udpgwtz88i.jpg)

Check Latest Price

The Aminy Bluetooth headset is an affordable, quality, noise-canceling
headphone that produces clear audio, voice and music included, ensuring safer
driving. The piece is lightweight and incredibly comfortable to wear, plus it
actually looks good on the ear, making it perfect for people who struggle to
find a truly snug and comfortable Bluetooth earbud fit.

The Aminy headset supports pretty much all Bluetooth devices, including
laptops, tablets, Notebooks and smartphones. The piece features a CSR chip and
built-in microphone, producing clear phone calls and Hi-Fi music sound.
Interestingly, it comes with two batteries, each supporting up to 8 hours of
talking time, meaning it does have a pretty good battery life overall. As for
its design, it’s truly one of the most comfortable Bluetooth headsets out

## Best Bluetooth Headset Buying Guide & FAQ

Bluetooth headsets have become highly sophisticated devices. Some broadcast
crystal-clear voice, others stream high-quality music and audio in general,
some come with noise-canceling capabilities and others have voice-recognition
features. But what makes a device the best Bluetooth headset, really? The
short answer is, whatever works best for you and your needs. The ambiguous
one? A lot of things – but we cover every single one in our buying guide.

Here, we'll talk about everything you need to know when purchasing a Bluetooth
headset. From the reasons why you should (or shouldn’t!) use a Bluetooth
headset, to the features you should be looking for in every Bluetooth device,
we mention every big and small thing you should know. So no matter if you’re
looking for basic Bluetooth headsets for phone calls only, or noise-canceling
headphones that also produce fantastic audio, our buying guide and FAQ section
should be able to help you pick the right product.

![man with bluetooth headset](https://www.carbibles.com/wp-
content/uploads/2018/11/man-with-bluetooth-headset.jpg)

## **Features to Consider When Buying a Bluetooth Headset**

To purchase the best Bluetooth headset, pay attention to the following
features and whether or not the Bluetooth earphones you like have them.

  * **Multipoint Pairing**

Today, most electronic devices integrate Bluetooth technology. From
smartphones and laptops to tablets and various gadgets, Bluetooth tech has
taken over. For this reason, it’s not uncommon to want to link Bluetooth
headphones to multiple Bluetooth-enabled devices – in fact, most people do it
nowadays as it makes using different gadgets at the same time easier. That’s
why Multipoint Pairing is an irreplaceable feature for folks who use two
smartphones – by allowing your headset to be connected to two different
devices, Multipoint Pairing enables you to make calls on either device. A
particularly useful feature if you use one phone for work and the other one
for pleasure.

  * **Comfortable/Adjustable Fit**

Although most people have similar ear sizes and shapes, we all have slightly
different ears. That’s why your friend’s ultra-comfortable Bluetooth earphone
may not be comfortable at all on your ear. Luckily, well-designed Bluetooth
headsets will feel snug and comfortable on pretty much all average ear sizes
and shapes, so it’s not that hard to find a good fit no matter the brand or
price. However, if you haven’t had luck with headsets in the past, it’s best
to pick a device that is customizable or adjustable and allows you to move it
around to find the best fit. Over-the-head Bluetooth headsets may be the best
solution in particularly difficult-to-fit cases.

  * **Good Battery Life**

Even the best Bluetooth headset in the world wouldn’t be worth much if it had
a poor battery life. Look for headsets with solid batteries that promise
relatively long battery life – not too long, though. Why? Manufacturers often
grossly overestimate the battery life of their product so it sells better,
which is why it’s not wise to blindly believe whatever the packaging says.
It’s a good idea to stick to devices that deliver a solid 5-8 hours of talk
and music time, as most budget Bluetooth headsets already offer that much (no
matter what they claim). Of course, if frequent charging bothers you, it may
be better to look for longer-lasting batteries, but do bear in mind that these
devices usually cost more.

  * **Newer Bluetooth Versions**

Bluetooth version matters – a lot. Not only are the newer versions compatible
with more devices, they’re also faster and more secure. Ideally, you want to
stick to Bluetooth versions 4.0 and above as they offer additional features
and improved connectivity and range. Still, there’s nothing wrong with older
versions, especially if you’re on a tight budget, but do bear in mind that the
newer the Bluetooth version, the better your headset will play with your other
devices and gadgets.

![bluetooth device](https://www.carbibles.com/wp-
content/uploads/2018/11/bluetooth-device-1.jpg)

## **Why You Should Use Bluetooth Headset**

There are numerous reasons why you should use a quality Bluetooth headset and
we’ll cover the most important ones here, starting from – of course – safety.

  * **Safer rides**

It should go without saying that distracted driving is a recipe for a
disaster. And you know what’s the most common cause of distracted driving?
Talking and texting. This is closely followed by looking at GPS directions and
fiddling with the music auio system. Luckily, you can eliminate or at least
greatly minimize all of these risks for distracted driving by using a quality
Bluetooth headset. A good headset will let you make and take calls either with
a push of a button or by using voice commands. It will also stream your music
the way you like and even tell you GPS directions if needed.

  * **No Cables**

One of the biggest benefits of Bluetooth headsets is the ability to be cable,
cord and wire-free. This allows for ultimate mobility and freedom, which is
especially welcome while you’re driving or exercising. With a wireless
Bluetooth headset on your ear, you don’t have to worry about getting caught
onto something and ripping the earbuds from your ears, or about those dreaded
wire knots in your pocket. Cable-free means fuss-free.

  * **Easier managing of multiple gadgets**

We all own and daily use at least a couple of electronic devices – laptops,
smartphones, tablets, smartwatches, you name it. Although most of these were
created to save us time, energy and effort – basically, to make out lives
easier – juggling several different gadgets at the same time can be difficult.
That’s why Bluetooth headsets are a great choice – with the Multiple Pairing
feature, they allow you to connect two devices and use them at the same time.
Using one phone for music and pleasure and the other one for business calls?
No problem – a quality Bluetooth headset will connect to both and let you
switch between them in a matter of seconds.

  * **Better Focus**

Speaking of owning and using multiple gadgets, have you noticed you’re less
focused on the road ahead of you when you’re on your phone, or fiddling with
your music stereo/tablet? It’s no wonder why – we function best when we’re
focused on one thing at a time, which is kind of impossible to do with your
eyes on the road, one hand on the wheel and one on your ear, holding a phone.
It’s similar while you’re exercising – you can’t properly focus on your
training if you’re texting at the same time. With a Bluetooth earpiece on
though? A piece of cake – no more toying with your phone or other electronics
while you’re driving/exercising/working, as you can take calls, listen to
music and even text hands-free (depending on the headset, of course).

## **What About Stereo Bluetooth Headphones?**

There are two main types of Bluetooth headsets: mono and stereo. To get the
best headset for your needs, see which type is better suited for your
lifestyle and preferences.

  * **Mono Bluetooth Headset**

If your job requires you to spend a lot of time on the phone with employees,
co-workers and clients, a good mono Bluetooth device is what you need. These
types of headsets broadcast and produce the clearest voice, meaning
communication is prioritized above all else. Of course, most mono Bluetooth
headsets can also stream music for you, read audiobooks, etc. so they’re
definitely multitaskers, however they can never produce high-quality audio
like stereo Bluetooth headsets can. These are the typical Bluetooth headsets
that you wear on either side of your head (all of the headsets featured on our
Top 10 list are monos). Because they leave one ear open to the environment,
mono Bluetooth headphones are perfect for driving and when you have to aware
of your environment or interact with people.

  * **Stereo Bluetooth Headset**

If you’re an audiophile who appreciates high-quality sound first and foremost,
it’s highly likely you prefer listening to music on both of your ears. This is
also perfectly natural – in music, stereo sound is created using two audio
channels, right and left, which mimics our ability to hear our surroundings.
This is why stereo Bluetooth headsets are better at reproducing music than
monos are. However, because they cover both of your ears, they’re anything but
ideal for tasks such as driving, bicycling or jogging in a busy city.

So which Bluetooth headset type is better for you? This entirely depends on
your lifestyle, but, if you’re looking for a good headpiece for when you’re
driving or interacting with other people, a mono Bluetooth headset is
definitely a better choice.

## **Best Bluetooth Headset FAQ:**

![headset in use](https://www.carbibles.com/wp-
content/uploads/2018/11/headset-in-use.jpg)

### **Q: How many channels does a Bluetooth headset usually use?**

**A:** Your typical Bluetooth headset (the one you wear on one of your ears)
uses one audio channel. This means it frees up one ear, allowing interaction
with others and awareness of surroundings. Stereo Bluetooth headsets, on the
other hand, offer two-channel output which is great news for music lovers, but
not so great when you have to be aware of your environment or interact with
others.

### **Q: What is the data throughput speed of a Bluetooth connection?**

**A:** The speed of data that enters and goes through a Bluetooth connection,
or throughput, depends on the Bluetooth version of your device – the newer the
version, the faster the data transmission. For example, Bluetooth V2.0’s
optimum speed is up to 3 Mbits/s, while the Bluetooth V3.0’s optimum speed is
up to 24 Mbits/s. Newer versions are even faster than this.

### **Q: Are different brands of Bluetooth products compatible with each
other?**

**A:** Most Bluetooth headsets work with most Bluetooth devices. For example,
a Motorola Bluetooth earpiece will work with an iPhone with no issues, just
like it will with pretty much any Android phone. However, there are a few
caveats here, and you may be surprised to learn that they have nothing to do
with different brands of Bluetooth products but different versions of
Bluetooth.

Generally speaking, a basic Bluetooth headset is going to work with most
recent versions of Bluetooth and even some older ones as they’re usually built
to be backward-compatible with older phones that use older versions of
Bluetooth. However, phones that are designed to use Bluetooth Smart technology
(V4.0 and above) may not be compatible with basic, older versions of
Bluetooth. This means that before buying a Bluetooth headset, you should check
its version and the version your phone and other gadgets use. While this can
be a pain, it’s better than ending up with a Bluetooth headset you cannot
connect to wanted devices. Saying that, if you use newer electronics which use
newer Bluetooth versions, there’s pretty much nothing to worry about – just
purchase a headset that also uses newer Bluetooth versions (V4.0 or above) and
you’ll be set.

### **Q: What is the range of Bluetooth transmitter/receivers?**

**A:** The transmission range of a Bluetooth device depends on the type of
class it falls into. There are three main classes.

  * **Class 1** device has a standard range of approximately 330 feet or 10 meters. This is implemented where the is plenty of power, such as in desktop systems or laptops.
  * **Class 2** device has a standard range of 33 feet or 10 meters. These are the most common Bluetooth transmitters and where the typical Bluetooth headsets and smartphones fall into.
  * **Class 3** device’s range is less than 10 meters.

![bluetooth gadget](https://www.carbibles.com/wp-
content/uploads/2018/11/bluetooth-gadget.jpg)

## **Our Top Pick**

All 10 Bluetooth headsets we reviewed here are solid, quality products. But if
you’d like to know which device offers best bang for buck, out of all of
these, it would have to be **FOCUSPOWER F10**. This tiny Bluetooth earbud is
so lightweight and compact that you’ll forget you’re wearing it after a short
while. It’s also water-resistant and supports voice command provided you have
it on your phone (Siri or Google Voice), which makes it ideal for driving,
exercising, and so on. Importantly, it uses Bluetooth V4.1 & EDR tech, which
makes it compatible with all newer Bluetooth devices, plus it’s pretty fast
with a good range. Best of all? It’s one of the most affordable quality
Bluetooth headsets on the market.

  1. [How Does Bluetooth Work?](https://www.scientificamerican.com/article/experts-how-does-bluetooth-work/) \- ScientificAmerican
